column2: Give it to a random, new [Root.Culture.GetAdjectiveCap] noble
Grant §Y[target_county.Location.GetName]§! to my kin and councillor ([This.GetJobTitle]), §Y[This.GetTitledName]§!.

For each recently-acquired province in your demesne that is not within your capital duchy, you will be prompted about whether to automatically distribute its titles. You may individually skip any such province in the process, leaving manual management of the province to you. No titles higher than count-tier will ever be distributed.

For each recently-acquired province in your demesne that is not within your capital duchy, you will be prompted about whether to automatically distribute its titles. You may individually skip any such province in the process, leaving manual management of the province to you. No titles higher than count-tier will ever be distributed.

For each recently-acquired province in your demesne that is not within your capital duchy, any titles that you hold within it will be automatically granted to new characters. Note that this behavior is specific to multiplayer, whereas in singleplayer, among other differences you are prompted about each province before granting it.
This province has been recently acquired and qualifies for automatic land distribution.
